Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back FREE DAILY MINIBAR View gallery / Back HIlton Beach Resort - Pool Hilton Beach Resort - restaurant HIlton Beach Resort - adults only pool HIlton Beach Resort - Restaurant 2 Fiji Hilton Fiji Beach Resort & Spa &vert; Return flights • 4 Nights • Transfers • Breakfast Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Everything about the Hilton Fiji Beach Resort & Spa oozes effortless luxury accompanied by traditional Fijian hospitality – so why not treat yourself? This resort stretches along 2.5 kilometres of beachfront and has available the scheduled Bula Express ‘golf cart’ shuttle service to transport guests to their rooms and resort facilities. View more View less 4 nights + flights, transfers, breakfast & more from $ 1779 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand FREE DAILY MINIBAR Enquire now Sale Period : until 21 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class (The Works) airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington*, Christchurch* to Nadi Add $180 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport 4 nights accommodation Return Nadi airport transfers Buffet breakfast daily FREE fully stocked mini bar every day of your stay (Hotel's selection of beverages) 20% off on food & beverage (Excludes room service) 20% off on selected Spa Treatment Treat yourself and upgrade your flights! Upgrade to Premium Economy from $280 per person return from Auckland Upgrade to Business Premier from $640 per person return from Auckland Based on travel: 25 Nov-12 Dec 25, 06 Jan-31 Mar, 20 Apr-29 Jun & 20 Jul-20 Sep 26 Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Gardenview Guestroom with lounge Enjoy serene views of a lush, tropical garden through the floor-to-ceiling windows and private patio of this tranquil guest room, complete with a separate lounge area. Auckland 4 night package from $1779 per person share twin Additional nights from $225 per person share twin Travel 25 Nov - 12 Dec 25, 12 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Auckland 4 night package from $1969 per person share twin Additional nights from $275 per person share twin Travel 20 Apr - 31 May 26 Wellington 4 night package from $1779 per person share twin Additional nights from $225 per person share twin Travel 25 Nov - 12 Dec 25, 12 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Wellington 4 night package from $1969 per person share twin Additional nights from $275 per person share twin Travel 20 Apr - 31 May 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $1779 per person share twin Additional nights from $225 per person share twin Travel 25 Nov - 12 Dec 25, 12 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $1969 per person share twin Additional nights from $275 per person share twin Travel 20 Apr - 31 May 26 Beachfront Guestroom Soak in breathtaking ocean and sunset views from the floor-to-ceiling windows and private patio or balcony of this inviting guest room. Auckland 4 night package from $1899 per person share twin Additional nights from $259 per person share twin Travel 25 Nov - 12 Dec 25, 12 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Auckland 4 night package from $2049 per person share twin Additional nights from $295 per person share twin Travel 20 Apr - 31 May 26 Wellington 4 night package from $1899 per person share twin Additional nights from $259 per person share twin Travel 25 Nov - 12 Dec 25, 12 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Wellington 4 night package from $2049 per person share twin Additional nights from $295 per person share twin Travel 20 Apr - 31 May 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $1899 per person share twin Additional nights from $259 per person share twin Travel 25 Nov - 12 Dec 25, 12 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $2049 per person share twin Additional nights from $295 per person share twin Travel 20 Apr - 31 May 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Fiji sightseeing optional add-ons Ultimate Encounters Snorkel with Sharks Get up close and personal – safely – with sharks while swimming in one of Fiji’s many pristine lagoons. The two main species encountered are the White Tip Reef Sharks and the Black Tip Reef Sharks. Some can grow up to 1.8 metres. This full day tour allows you to experience the lagoon snorkelling and then spend time at the rustic Barefoot Kuata Resort in the southern Yasawa Islands for lunch and an afternoon of by the beach or poolside. Includes: All transfers, snorkelling equipment, guided reef snorkelling with shark and lunch. Operates: Daily Duration: 9 hours Price from $305 per adult, $305 per child (5-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 South Sea Sailing - Sabre This full-day sailing experience on the 78-foot sailing catamaran SABRE, will cruise through the Mamanuca Islands, where onboard you can shelter under shaded canopies, seating booths, day beds or relax on one of many bean bags. During the day, you’ll stop to snorkel, or swim at the tropical reef or sand cay. Gourmet buffet lunch is served along with a complimentary selection of local beer and wine for 2 hours (served from lunchtime onwards), soft drinks, and mineral water (served all day). It’s an fantastic tour to add on to your mainland resort package. Includes: Hotel transfers, catamaran sailing experience, use of snorkelling gear, buffet lunch, complimentary selection of local beer and wine for 2 hours (served from lunchtime onwards) complimentary soft drinks and bottled mineral water (served all day) Operates: Daily Duration: 7 hours Price from $205 per adult, $105 per child (5-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Malamala Beach Club – Full Day Tour Fiji’s only island beach club, just 25 minutes from Port Denarau is the perfect option to add onto your mainland stay. Day pass club entry includes return Denarau Marina transfers and allows you to enjoy the white sand beaches, pristine lagoon waters, a resort style infinity edge pool and beachside cabanas (surcharged). Delicious island cuisine and beverages are available, along with an island massage spa menu (additional charges apply). Half Day Tours are available – ask us for more information. Includes: Hotel transfers, return vessel transfers from Port Denarau to Malamala, free WiFi, on island towel service, use of non-motorised watersports equipment. Note: No discounts for children. Operates: Daily Duration: 7 hours Price from $149 per adult, $149 per child (3+ yrs) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Cloud 9 Fiji Here’s an unreal, ridiculously relaxing way to round off your mainland stay – a bar and gourmet pizzeria floating in the middle of the ocean. Sun decks, hanging chairs, day beds and clear turquoise water all around. Out of this world! Includes a FJ$60 credit. Includes: Hotel transfers, return vessel transfers from Port Denarau to Cloud9, F$60 credit for onboard food and drinks. Operates: Daily Duration: 6 hours Price from $249 per adult, $225 per child (10-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Seventh Heaven Fiji Be prepared to experience a floating paradise! Seventh Heaven is a pontoon located in the Mamanuca Island Group, only a 45 minute boat ride from Port Denarau. It has an international bar and restaurant, freshwater shower, clean facilities, comfortable lounging spaces, kayaking, snorkelling, massage rooms and more. Operates: Daily Duration: 6 hours Price from $135 per adult, $109 per child (10-16 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Captain Cook Sunset Dinner Cruise The luxurious sleek sailing catamaran Fiji One will take you on a spectacular 3 hour cruise amongst the magnificent Mamanuca Islands. You can sit back and relax with a complimentary welcome drink while the chefs prepare a sumptuous tropical buffet dinner from fresh local ingredients. Pricing based on departures from selected Nadi and Denarau accommodation. Operates: Tues-Sun Duration: 3 hours Price from $149 per adult, $85 per child (3-15 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Go Dirty Tours – Play Dirty ATV Tour Hit the dirt & drive for a pure riding experience. During the 2-3 hour tour you will splash through mud puddles (a seasonal offering), zip by cane fields, and ride higher up the pine forest mountainside before stopping on a mountain plateau overlooking the Mamanuca Islands. Pricing based on departures from selected Nadi and Denarau accommodation. Operates: Daily Duration: 2-3 hours Price from $269 per driver. Minimum age 16yrs with valid drivers licence Price from $165 per passenger (max 1) Travel: 01 Apr 24-31 Mar 26 Captain Cook - Island & Reef Day Sail A must-do Fijian, barefoot Island experience on your own private tropical island beach. Set sail for the spectacular Kadavu Lailai Private Beach in the Mamanucas. Enjoy the pristine white sandy beach and acres of coral gardens where you can spend the day snorkelling, paddle boarding, kayaking or playing beach volleyball with the crew. Join a nature walk and/or guided marine tour with our resident Marine Biologists and take part in the ‘Build a Reef’ coral restoration program. There is also the Captains Kids Club to keep the little ones engaged while you spend some ‘me’ time relaxing or snorkelling. Enjoy a fresh tropical BBQ buffet lunch with an ice-cold beer, house wine or juice and enjoy listening to the soulful voices of the Fijian crew as they serenade you while you eat and take in the spectacular views. Operates: Daily Duration: 10am-5pm Price from $209 per adult, $129 per child (3-15 years) Travel: 01 Jun 25-31 Mar 26 Beachcomber Island Cruise – Full Day Escape to paradise with an unforgettable day trip to the stunning Beachcomber Island, departing from Port Denarau Marina at 10:00 AM and returning at 4:45 PM. This tropical escape blends relaxation, adventure, and culture in one perfect island experience. Enjoy a scenic boat transfer to and from the island, where you’ll be treated to a delicious beachfront BBQ buffet lunch and a selection of local beers, house wine, and soft drinks. Dive into the vibrant underwater world with guided snorkelling trips, and make the most of complimentary snorkelling gear and non-motorized water sports like kayaking and paddleboarding. Get hands-on with traditional Fijian experiences, including a Kokoda-making class and basket weaving, and take part in unique encounters like turtle feeding and coral viewing with fish feeding. With morning and afternoon tea provided and so much more to discover, this Beachcomber Island day trip is the perfect way to soak up the sun, connect with nature, and immerse yourself in Fijian culture. Don’t miss your chance to experience this island adventure and create memories that will last a lifetime! Operates: Daily Duration: 6 hours 45 minutes Price from $195 per adult, $99 per child (3-11 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 27 Terms & Conditions Sale ends 21 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 04 Nov 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Economy class flying Air New Zealand (The Works) to Nadi from Auckland, *Wellington & *Christchurch (*Wellington & Christchurch via Auckland). • Upgrades to Premier Economy & Business Premier only valid on the AKL-NAN-AKL sector, domestic flights to/from Auckland will be in Economy class, upgrades only for travel between 25 Nov-12 Dec 25, 06 Jan-31 Mar, 20 Apr-29 Jun & 20 Jul-20 Sep 26. • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense . Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary • Any value adds or meal/beverage packages that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash • If adding a Meal /Beverage package it must be purchased for all adults for the full duration of your accommodation • Min/max stays apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Availability during school holiday & peak travel periods may be limited • Advertised prices are per person share twin based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding • Where Kids eat free, this is from selected restaurants, from selected menus at set times • Kids club age restrictions apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 01 Nov 24, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Fuel surcharges may be applied without notice payable direct. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
